thread.title: Cryptocurrencies failing as money, says BOE's Carney

title: Cryptocurrencies failing as money, says BOE's Carney
text:
Cryptocurrencies failing as money, says BOE's Carney 5:40pm GMT - 01:43 
Cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin are failing as a form of money and have shown clear signs of being a financial bubble, Bank of England Governor Mark Carney said on Friday. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin are failing as a form of money and have shown clear signs of being a financial bubble, Bank of England Governor Mark Carney said on Friday. David Pollard reports.
